      • getSeriesByGenre

        public java.util.List<Series> getSeriesByGenre(java.lang.String search,
                                      User user)
                                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves all series corresponding to the genre from the database.
        Parameters:
        search - Genre to be queried by.
        user - User whose series are queried. If the user is admin all users' series are queried.
        Returns:
        A list of series.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
